title: Need ideas to make leveling smurf bearable.
body:
Fun builds to play (im particularly fond of playing ad champs as ap etc etc)
Little challenges i can do mid game etc etc

Anything to get my mind off the fact i can be 10/0 and make one little mistake and because everyones level 5 i wont get peels and ill die (mostly cus im playing against gold 2's etc and im still level 18 on the account so the rune difference alone makes it pretty easy to rofl stomp me if im caught out).

replies.body: AP Riven mid is the pinnacle of AP build AD champs, if you master her you can do anything.
Mate youve just single handedly ruined someones game because im saving up for riven right now just to do this.

If you want, you can go AP Riven bot lane carry instead of mid, you get all the boons of having a support allow you to farm peacefully for items that do nothing, AND you get less EXP to level up!

I recommend you choose between spell effects + AP Scaling items (Lich and Luden's), or just AP and MPen (Void + Rabadon's) depending on how hard core you want to be.

Oh god I'm a jerk why am I ruining games by advertising Riven to a new audience (People who can actually play)
AP aatrox is where it's at.
lol no AP Riven is much much better.
Way ahead of you mate been  a brave for a year or so now.

AP Tristana, AP Caitlyn (Works well in ARAMs anyway. Traps + Ludens + Liandry's = OP) and Full AP Naut (Surprisingly good mid with Flash+Ignite. His damage is good and the CC is incredible) 
Those are my faves/the only odd things I've really tried lol
There's a lot out there to try but

Step 1. Free up your weekend with 1-2 days buffer before and after.
Step 2. Go to Coles and buy 24 pack of Red Bull, Mountain Dew, Doritos and Salsa.
Step 3. Set up drip from your urinary track to a bucket (bucket size may vary).
Step 4. Create account with name like "hi im wannabe".
Step 5. Unlock Riot Girl Tristana.
Step 6. Purchase XP boost for 3 days and XP boost for 50 wins.
Step 7. Play Tristana in bots for the next 3 days.
Step 8. Play ranked on day 4.
Step 9. Repeat.
